reviews.review: It's a really fun FPS and u should play it and its FREE

One of the best games of all time!
eh. its ok but not that good.

Team Fortress 2 is one of the finest crafted first person shooters I have ever had the pleasure of playing. Its right up there with Titanfall 2 and Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare. The cartoonish graphics ensures the game will age well, and it doesn't hurt that the quality of the game is excellent. The characters are all funny and unique, offering different play styles, customization and weapon loadouts. My personal favorites include the Soldier, Demoman and Engineer. This game could easily be a full price game, but Valve does you the gigantic favor of making it free. The gameplay and controls are near to flawless, and you can kill hours a day without getting bored. This game rarely lags or glitchs online, which helps compared to online games in the past. This game became my  one of my favorite shooters of all time in less than twelve hours, and it earned it, establishing Valve as one of the greatest game developers of all time.

9-Amazing
+Colorful and Fun Cartoon Graphics
+Memorable and Hillarious Characters
+Huge Amounts of Customization
+Smooth Controls
+Great Online Strength
+Really Hard to Get Bored

-Lack of Campaign to draw in more Casual Players and Completionists

Все,это походу конец,придется продавать инветарь.Ладно обновления выходят раз 5-7 месяцов,и то скины добавляют,сервера начали пустовать,это игра начала надоедать людям,как и мне.Были времена,что найгрывал только TF2 по 70 часов за 2 недели,теперь,15-20 минут...Я благодарен габену,за эту игру.Буду помнить тебя,tf2. ;-;
